title: Rawsamble: Overlapping and Assembling Raw Nanopore Signals using a Hash-based Seeding Mechanism
details: C Firtina, M Mordig, H Mustafa, S Goswami, NM Ghiasi… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Raw nanopore signal analysis is a common approach in genomics to provide fast and resource-efficient analysis without translating the signals to bases (ie, without basecalling). However, existing solutions cannot interpret raw signals directly if a …
